permissions: Any authenticated user can list tags; non-admin users only see tags applied to taggables they can access.
validation_notes: Filter --name performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Filters --tag-category-slug and --for-taggable-type accept comma-separated lists.

flags.name: --tag-category-id
flags.description: Filter by tag category ID. Example: 123.

flags.name: --tag-category-slug
flags.description: Filter by tag category slug. Example: "priority".

flags.name: --for-taggable-type
flags.description: Filter by taggable entity type. Example: PredictionSubject.
